subtitleNullable: Weekly market prices of meat in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia from 2018-2021
descriptionNullable:
### Context

The market price of meat in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia varies greatly by season. This is due to the traditional nature of the meat production industry, which still relies on nomadic herders. Prices spike in the Spring and Summer while herd animals are breeding and fall in the Winter as herders cull the weakest animals.


### Content

Weekly level average market prices per kilogram in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia for four types of meat. All prices are in MNT.


### Acknowledgements

Thank you very much to the National Statistics Office of Mongolia (1212.mn) for the amazing work they do aggregate all this data.
